channel.title: [PI] Acheron - Official Release
channel.description:
[PI] Acheron (official release)
[center][b][color=red]*I DO NOT GIVE THE PERMISSION TO ANYONE ELSE TO RELEASE THIS FILES*[/b][/center] [center][b][color=red]*IF YOU NEED ANY HELP, FEEL FREE TO INBOX ME*[/b][/center] [center][b][color=red]*I CAN HELP CODING*[/b][/center]
Source Download - [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/Acheron%20Source.rar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/Acheron%20Source.rar[/url] Client Download - [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/Acheron%20Client.rar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/Acheron%20Client.rar[/url] Cache Download -[url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/acheron.cache.zip]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/acheron.cache.zip[/url]
[u]Credits[/u] - Me (Maximebasque) - Brian (My friend) - InsidiaX - TrisidiaX
[u]Features[/u] - Dicing - Pm logs - Chat logs - Commands logs - Vote store - Curse prayer - Players shop - Donator island - IDE Path fixed - All Tzhaar waves - 100% Lamp System - Custom quest tab - Bank slots fixed - Vote4Cash system - Money pouch fixed - 317 Gameframe fixed - Multiple custom item - Custom ranks + crowns - Clan chat + Lootshare - Donator Credits system - Ingame item spawner GUI - Staff interface options - Created summoning system - Perfect skillcape emotes - All 25 skill work perfectly - Perfect combat + perfect PVP - Dungeoneering & Pk'ing skills - Skillcape shop with no more lag - Quest cape require all stats 99 - Christmas craker system opening - Loyalty titles system color fixed - Donator cape gives 1.5x more experiences *Much more*
[u]Ranks + Crowns[/u] 1- Moderator 2- Administrator 3- Co-Owner 4- Donator 5- Sponsor 6- Owner 7- V.I.P 8- Trusted 9- Veteran
[u]Minigames[/u] - Barrows - Duel arena - Tzhaar cave - Pest control - Warriors guild
[u]Bosses[/u] - Godwars - Corporal beast - Dagannoth kings - Tormented demons - King black dragon
[u]Medias[/u]
Pickup System [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/Pickupsystem_zps2257a9a2.png[/img]

Quest Tab [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/Questtab_zps59b59f2c.png[/img]
Skillcape Shop [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/SkillcapeShop_zpsed5f71be.png[/img]
Summoning [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/Summoning_zps95fb6ef8.png[/img]
Skilling Zone [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/Skillingzone_zps30dae74b.png[/img]
Yelling [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/Yelling_zpsf542a063.png[/img]
Equipment [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/Equipments_zps59179508.png[/img]
Emotes [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/Emotes_zps07a7e163.png[/img]
Clan Chat [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Acheron%20Medias/Clanchat_zpsce317e0f.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Acheron - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @jaximus jaximus
item.description:
@jaximus wrote:

NRR:

when in you own shop, (playername shop) and an item in your inventory and you click, value, it lags you out? any tips? thanks.

There’s a lot of problem with player shops, i’d remove it if i was you, causes lots of problems and dupes.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Acheron - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @maximebasque maximebasque
item.description:
@maximebasque wrote:

Only change this one —> server = “127.0.0.1”;
To your ip/no-ip and make sure your port 43594 is open.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Acheron - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_Pk Ivycial
item.description:
@Bandos_Pk wrote:

reventix:

how do i change the IP on the client? i found the two instances of 127.0.0.1 and changed them in client.java but im still getting error conecting to server, im new to PI

You only have to change one lol.

item.title: [PI] Acheron - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @maximebasque maximebasque
item.description:
@maximebasque wrote:

[PI] Acheron (official release)

[center][color=red]I DO NOT GIVE THE PERMISSION TO ANYONE ELSE TO RELEASE THIS FILES[/center]
[center][color=red]IF YOU NEED ANY HELP, FEEL FREE TO INBOX ME[/center]
[center][color=red]I CAN HELP CODING[/center]

Source Download - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/Acheron%20Source.rar
Client Download - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/Acheron%20Client.rar
Cache Download -https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/Acheron/acheron.cache.zip

Credits

  • Me (Maximebasque)
  • Brian (My friend)
  • InsidiaX
  • TrisidiaX

Features

  • Dicing
  • Pm logs
  • Chat logs
  • Commands logs
  • Vote store

  • Players shop
  • Donator island
  • IDE Path fixed
  • All Tzhaar waves

  • Bank slots fixed

  • Money pouch fixed
  • 317 Gameframe fixed
  • Multiple custom item
  • Custom ranks + crowns

  • Staff interface options
  • Created summoning system
  • Perfect skillcape emotes
  • All 25 skill work perfectly
  • Perfect combat + perfect PVP
  • Dungeoneering & Pk’ing skills
  • Skillcape shop with no more lag
  • Quest cape require all stats 99
  • Christmas craker system opening
  • Loyalty titles system color fixed
  • Donator cape gives 1.5x more experiences
    Much more
